text:
="preserve">Sir Neil James Douglas (28 May 1949 – 23 August 2020) was a Scottish medical doctor. He was president of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh (RCPE) from 2004 to 2010 and chairman of the Academy of Medical Royal Colleges (AoMRC) from 2009 to 2012.
Douglas died on 23 August 2020 in Edinburgh, aged 71.

annotations.surface_form: Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh
